DataElement.preferredName: Health Status Assessment Observation Start Date/Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.:Watching something and taking note of what happens._The calendar date on which something is to start or did start._The time at which something is to start or did start.:Watching something and taking note of what happens._The calendar date on which something is to start or did start._The time at which something is to start or did start._An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.
